instructions: Go to Settings > Control Center > Customize Controls, then tap the Insert button next to accessibility features you use the most. To activate an accessibility feature from Control Center, open Control Center , then tap the accessibility feature.

Download and install the ESPN Live Sports & Scores app on your phone, tablet or other compatible device. Launch and login to the ESPN Live Sports & Scores app. Tap on the Gear icon. Tap Manage TV Provider . Select your cable or satellite provider from the list. Tap Continue . If your device isn't connected to your home Wi-Fi network, you will need to provide your cable or satellite username and password manually. Tap the icon (three dots.) Search for Monday Night Football , and choose a game.
